name: crank it up
description:
crank it up is a top down shooter where you play as a robot in the itch.io server that has to kill fish (don't ask me why) to keep the servers up and running you do this by picking up game jam jars dropped by the enemies and you bring them to a loading zone to rewind the power bar

the catch is that your battery life is awful and you have to stop moving and rewind yourself to  keep yourself alive and well

good luck
